Forbes Carpet Installations 717-8059 
25 years experience installing residential and commercial carpet .
I follow guide lines set by the manufacturers and the CRI to insure you keep your warranty . Power stretcher is used instead of a carpet kicker so your warranty will not be void and you will not have damage to your carpet . Two million liability insured and WCB insured . Written one year guarantee on all work . Call Jim 7178059
